meanings.definition: A derogatory term used to insult someone.
meanings.sent1: The teacher scolded the students for calling each other fuckheads.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends laughed at the fuckheads who cut in line at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: When the toddler called his toy a fuckhead, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The comedian joked that the rude customer was the king of all fuckheads.
meanings.sent5: The word 'fuckheads' is not allowed in this classroom, young man!

meanings.definition: Plural form of fuckhead, referring to multiple individuals who are considered foolish or annoying.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors complained about the noisy fuckheads next door.
meanings.sent2: The teacher separated the two fuckheads who wouldn't stop talking during class.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pointed at the mischievous puppies and called them fuckheads.
meanings.sent4: The boss referred to the lazy employees as a bunch of fuckheads.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was surrounded by a group of evil fuckheads.
